level.text: Constituent limited cooperative associations may agree to call a merger a consolidation under this subchapter.

All provisions governing mergers or using the term merger in this chapter shall apply equally to mergers that the constituent associations choose to call consolidations under subsection (a) of his [sic] section.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 1611 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
